function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of emphasis on hygiene and sanitation in community-based adaptation initiatives","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission within communities","Mitigation":"Incorporating hygiene and sanitation education and infrastructure development into community-based adaptation initiatives","Technologies":"Sanitation systems, water purification technologies","People":"Local community members","Owner":"NGOs, local governments"},{"Description":"Inadequate healthcare access for community members in rural areas","Impact":"Higher susceptibility to contagious diseases due to lack of healthcare facilities","Mitigation":"Improving access to healthcare services and medical facilities in rural areas","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile clinics","People":"Local community members in rural areas","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Limited communication and coordination between community-based adaptation projects and public health initiatives","Impact":"Missed opportunities to integrate disease prevention strategies into community-based adaptation efforts","Mitigation":"Establishing communication channels between public health authorities and community-based adaptation projects to share information and coordinate efforts","Technologies":"Information sharing platforms, mobile health apps","People":"Community-based adaptation practitioners, public health authorities","Owner":"Academic institutions, government agencies"}]}
